name: CATAVANEER
description:
Catavaneer is a multiplayer hack n’ slash game where players work as a team of cats tasked with escorting a moving caravan and fighting bandits. 

Catavaneer is made by CryoByte Studio which is a group of student at Toronto Film School as the capstone project.

The game is only fully functional by a XBOX controller, if you have a PS4 controller try using DS4Windos for now. 

For those don't have a controller at home, don't worry. Check the YouTube video for 25 mins of actual in game footage!
